All mass must be used up in the final turn. Aim is to get ones own KerbinÃ‚Â´s orbit into the eco-zone of Kerbol during its entire orbit and keep it there by the end of the game.

Probably needless to say on this forum, that the bodies already in the system are rotating around Kerbol and start to influence one another, when they get close to each other. The players toss their masses into the system by eyeballing - no numbers on the screen, please - direction and speed (and timing - the system is in constant motion after the first object has been inserted). If the other player already tossed his kerbin in the ecozone successfully, youÃ‚Â´ll want to steer it away from that by means of the gravity of one of your masses (- like try to toss a gas giant in a slightly lower orbit, wait till it passes the opponents Kerbin and have it pull it out of its orbit).
